attributes.action: Signage must be in the English Language
attributes.additional_details: The government should legislate that any public signage, posters, leaflets, etc which are displayed in a language other than English, must have an English translation within the same sign or document and in the same size of lettering.   This should cover cultural centres, places of worship, public buildings, etc.  The English translation should be certified as correct by the local authority and any associated costs should be covered by the sign owner.
